abstract: A new report on companies’ opinions of social media advertising shows that companies are spending more on that strategy, though they are concerned with getting an accurate measurement of its effectiveness.
snippet: A new report on companies’ opinions of social media advertising shows that companies are spending more on that strategy, though they are concerned with getting an accurate measurement of its effectiveness.
lead_paragraph: Since the arrival of social media platforms, companies have tried to figure out how to best use them to get their messages to consumers, often with mixed results. Some brands have embraced the notion that social platforms like Twitter allow constant interaction, for better or worse, with their customers.

headline.main: Report Gauges Companies’ Approach to Advertising on Social Media
